column1: The funeral service for will be held at 11:00 a.m. on Monday
column3: at the St. John Lutheran Church in Wadena
column4: with Pastor Stephen Meltzer officiating. Friends may call on Sunday at the Johnson-Schuller Chapel in Wadena from 5:00 to 7:30 p.m.
column5: and at the church on Monday from 9:30 a.m. until the time of service.
